name.ch: 法學研究方法與論文寫作

department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

goal.ch: This course is expected to train students to better researching and writing skills as to prepare to conduct a legal thesis/dissertation or other upper-level writing project.
goal.en: This course is expected to train students to better researching and writing skills as to prepare to conduct a legal thesis/dissertation or other upper-level writing project.

outline.ch: ‧ There are some tools that can help your reading (e.g., Black’s Law Dictionary ＆ The Bluebook). Using these tools smart should be one of the most basic skills for a law student/researcher. ‧ This course will also train students to have abilities to utilize some sources most commonly used in legal research (e.g., Westlaw, Lexis Advance, Bloomberg Law, Harvard Law Review, and etc.).‧ This class will train students to think deeply and develop their own thesis arguments.

flexDiscription.ch: Self-directed learning has been deemed an important skill. It can increase students' self-confidence, independence, and motivation. Therefore, students can write a research paper in these two weeks.
